com.artemis

Class WorldConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.WorldConfiguration

  • public final class WorldConfiguration
extends Object
    Contains configuration for your world. Can be used for: - Adding Systems. - Adding Managers. - Registering Pojo to inject. - Registering custom dependency injector.
    See Also:
    allows convenient creation.

      • register

        public WorldConfiguration register(Object o)
        Manually register object for injection by type. Explicitly annotate to be injected fields with @Wire. A class level @Wire annotation is not enough. Since objects are injected by type, this method is limited to one object per type. Use register(String, Object) to register multiple objects of the same type. Not required for systems.
        Parameters:
        o - object to inject.
        Returns:
        This instance for chaining.

      • register

        public WorldConfiguration register(String name,
                          Object o)
        Manually register object for injection by name. Explicitly annotate to be injected fields with @Wire(name="myName"). A class level @Wire annotation is not enough. Not required for systems.
        Parameters:
        name - unique identifier matching injection site name.
        o - object to inject.
        Returns:
        This instance for chaining.

      • setSystem

        public WorldConfiguration setSystem(Class<? extends BaseSystem> system)
        Adds a system to this world that will be processed by World.process().
        Parameters:
        system - the system to add
        Returns:
        the added system

        public <T extends BaseSystem> WorldConfiguration setSystem(T system)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the added system
